inclusion.criterion: at least1 year of diagnosed HF
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) lower than 40% measured by echocardiography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: compensated HF with optimal medication for at least 3 months prior the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: New York Heart Association (NYHA) class of I to IV
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with chronic renal failure with haemodialysis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with muscular dystrophy (i.e. Duchenne muscular dystrophy)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients submitted to any hormonal treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
